Paragraph: Wild - type ( WT ) and ILK : liver - / - mice were given PB ( 0 . 1 % in drinking water ) for 10 days .

| Chemical |
| --- |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions the administration of PB (lead phenylbutionate) to Wild-type (WT) and ILK : liver-/- mice in the form of 0.1% solution in drinking water. Therefore, PB is the only valid chemical entity mentioned in the paragraph.
